sn42.6:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava nalandayam viharati pavarikambavane.
sn42.6:1.2: Atha kho asibandhakaputto gamani yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho asibandhakaputto gamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.6:2.1: “brahmana, bhante, paccha bhumaka kamandaluka sevalamalika udakorohaka aggiparicaraka.
sn42.6:2.2: Te matam kalankatam uyyapenti nama sannapenti nama saggam nama okkamenti.
sn42.6:2.3: Bhagava pana, bhante, araham sammasambuddho pahoti tatha katum yatha sabbo loko kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya”ti?
sn42.6:3.1: “Tena hi, gamani, tannevettha patipucchissami. Yatha te khameyya tatha nam byakareyyasiti.
sn42.6:4.2: idhassa puriso panatipati adinnadayi kamesumicchacari musavadi pisunavaco pharusavaco samphappalapi abhijjhalu byapannacitto micchaditthiko.
sn42.6:4.3: Tamenam mahajanakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya:
sn42.6:4.4: ‘ayam puriso kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjatu’ti.
sn42.6:4.6: api nu so puriso mahato janakayassa ayacanahetu va thomanahetu va panjalika anuparisakkanahetu va kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya”ti?
sn42.6:5.1: “Seyyathapi, gamani, puriso mahatim puthusilam gambhire udakarahade pakkhipeyya.
sn42.6:5.2: Tamenam maha janakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya:
sn42.6:5.3: ‘ummujja, bho puthusile, uplava, bho puthusile, thalamuplava, bho puthusile’ti.
sn42.6:5.5: api nu sa puthusila mahato janakayassa ayacanahetu va thomanahetu va panjalika anuparisakkanahetu va ummujjeyya va uplaveyya va thalam va uplaveyya”ti?
sn42.6:5.7: “Evameva kho, gamani, yo so puriso panatipati adinnadayi kamesumicchacari musavadi pisunavaco pharusavaco samphappalapi abhijjhalu byapannacitto micchaditthiko.
sn42.6:5.8: Kincapi tam maha janakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya:
sn42.6:5.9: ‘ayam puriso kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjatu’ti, atha kho so puriso kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya.
sn42.6:6.2: idhassa puriso panatipata pativirato adinnadana pativirato kamesumicchacara pativirato musavada pativirato pisunaya vacaya pativirato pharusaya vacaya pativirato samphappalapa pativirato anabhijjhalu abyapannacitto sammaditthiko.
sn42.6:6.3: Tamenam maha janakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya:
sn42.6:6.4: ‘ayam puriso kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjatu’ti.
sn42.6:6.6: api nu so puriso mahato janakayassa ayacanahetu va thomanahetu va panjalika anuparisakkanahetu va kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya”ti?
sn42.6:7.1: “Seyyathapi, gamani, puriso sappikumbham va telakumbham va gambhire udakarahade ogahetva bhindeyya. Tatra yassa sakkhara va kathala va sa adhogami assa; yanca khvassa tatra sappi va telam va tam uddham gami assa.
sn42.6:7.2: Tamenam maha janakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya:
sn42.6:7.3: ‘osida, bho sappitela, samsida, bho sappitela, adho gaccha, bho sappitela’ti.
sn42.6:7.5: api nu tam sappitelam mahato janakayassa ayacanahetu va thomanahetu va panjalika anuparisakkanahetu va osideyya va samsideyya va adho va gaccheyya”ti?
sn42.6:8.1: “Evameva kho, gamani, yo so puriso panatipata pativirato, adinnadana pativirato, kamesumicchacara pativirato, musavada pativirato, pisunaya vacaya pativirato, pharusaya vacaya pativirato, samphappalapa pativirato, anabhijjhalu, abyapannacitto, sammaditthiko,
sn42.6:8.2: kincapi tam maha janakayo sangamma samagamma ayaceyya thomeyya panjaliko anuparisakkeyya:
sn42.6:8.3: ‘ayam puriso kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjatu’ti, atha kho so puriso kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya”ti.
sn42.6:8.4: Evam vutte, asibandhakaputto gamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
